summary.para: Called when a cue event occurs in a text track.

param.name: cueEvent
param.para: A value specifying the type of event that has occurred.

param.name: currentTime
param.para: The current time when the cue event occurred.

summary.para: Called when an error occurs in a text track.

param.name: errorCode
param.para: An MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE representing the last error.

param.name: extendedErrorCode
param.para: The extended error code for the last error.

param.name: sourceTrackId
param.para: The identifier of the track on which the error occurred.

summary.para: Called when a text track is added

param.name: trackId
param.para: The identifier of the track that was added.

summary.para: Called when a text track is removed.

param.name: trackId
param.para: The identifier of the track that was removed.

summary.para: Called when a track is selected or deselected.

param.name: trackId
param.para: The identifier of the track that was selected or deselected.

param.name: selected
param.para: TRUE if the track was selected. FALSE if the track was deselected.

summary.para: Interface that defines callbacks for Microsoft Media Foundation Timed Text notifications.
